name: MEC Merino Long Johns - Youths
description:
Body fitted and soft to the touch, these merino wool long johns are designed to sit next to skin, working with your outer layers to seal warmth in and wick sweat away. Flat seams reduce chafing during activity.Made of circular knit merino wool jersey and nylon blend that naturally controls odour.Nylon yarns increase durability.Flatlock seams won't rub or chafe.Gusseted crotch and elastic waistband provide a non-constrictive fit.Interior name label so it won't get lost.Coordinates with MEC Merino Long Sleeve Crew.
